text:
M. S. Novik
January 10, 1955
Harry:
How do you feel about may sending Schooley
copies of my memos to you? I used to do it with
Graydon. I think I asked you this in one of my
notes. It’s OK either wayc
I didtated my letters to you re St. Louis
and Boston before 1 went off to Washington last
week and I didn’t send Schooley copi^
MSN:ck
